conversations: ==> SPEAKER_01:: Mr. Chude, does TikTok access the home Wi-Fi network?
==> SPEAKER_00:: Only if the user turns on the Wi-Fi. I'm sorry, I may not understand the question.
==> SPEAKER_01:: So if I have a TikTok app on my phone and my phone is on my home Wi-Fi network, does TikTok access that network?
==> SPEAKER_00:: you will have to access the network to get connections to the internet, if that's the question.
==> SPEAKER_01:: Is it possible, then, that it could access other devices on that home Wi-Fi network?
==> SPEAKER_00:: Congressman, we do not do anything that is beyond any industry norms. I believe the answer to your question is no. It could be technical. Let me get back to you.
